origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'OPECPlus.get_latest_decision', 'description': 'Get the latest decision made by OPEC+ regarding oil production cuts.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'organization', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the organization, e.g., OPEC+.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'decision', 'description': 'A dictionary containing details about the latest production cut decision.'}]}, {'name': 'GlobalTourism.get_cost_data', 'description': 'Get cost data for global tourism, including aviation fuel and transportation costs.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector of tourism to get cost data for, e.g., aviation, transportation.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'cost_data', 'description': 'A dictionary containing cost data for the specified tourism sector.'}]}, {'name': 'DataAnalysis.analyze_impact', 'description': 'Analyze the impact of a specific event on a sector based on provided data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'event', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The event to analyze, e.g., OPEC+ production cut.'}, {'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector to analyze, e.g., global tourism.'}, {'name': 'data', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The data to analyze, e.g., cost data for the sector.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the analysis of the impact of the event on the sector.'}]}, {'name': 'ImpactAssessment.provide_assessment', 'description': 'Provide an assessment of the impact based on the analysis.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'analysis', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The analysis data to base the assessment on.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'assessment', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the assessment of the impact.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要评估欧佩克+组织减产决定对全球旅游业的影响。首先，获取欧佩克+组织最近一次减产决定的详细信息。然后，获取全球旅游业（如航空燃油成本、运输成本）的成本数据。接着，分析这些数据以确定减产对旅游业的影响。最后，提供基于这些分析的旅游业影响评估。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取欧佩克+组织最近一次减产决定的详细信息。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'organization'的值是什么?
